Property.name: Enabled
Property.HelpText: Set to True to enable quick save reloading.

Property.name: UsePromptVersion
Property.HelpText: Use the version of the mod where it instead reloads the initial save file prompt, allowing you to choose or make a new file in-game.

Property.name: SaveNum
Property.HelpText: The file number that will be used when reloading saves.

Property.name: DeleteMainFile
Property.HelpText: If using prompt version and reloading, it will delete and backup the specified file for quicker menuing.

Property.name: DeleteChao
Property.HelpText: When reloading, it will also attempt to delete the chao save file if it exists. (Will be backed up in the mod folder)

Property.name: ReloadDelay
Property.HelpText: If True, you need to hold Y down for 0.25s in order to reload as a pose to just pressing it.

Property.name: ForceReload
Property.HelpText: Reload savefile when the title screen loads no matter what (ignores button inputs).
